API Documentation#

Fly By Generator#

The starting file is the FlyByGen.py. It is responsible for configuration of the project.

This includes:

  • Logging tools to enable log files of the process

  • Starting of all subprocess which are the building blocks of the project.

param paths:

The Path paramter is a globally defined parameter defined in src/config/paths.json file. The parameter is imported to each file through the json file and thus does not require to be used as function paramter.

class FlyByGen.FlyByGen#
logging_setup()#

Instantiates the logger and starts logging everything after the configuration is done

Returns:

A Output Logger object used to run subprocesses with active logging.

Return type:

obj[OutputLogger]

set_blender_paths()#

Loads the commands from the json file and combines the blocks into a string which can be run by a subprocess

Returns:

Blender subprocess execution command

Return type:

[str]
